text: Part Time Wife is a 1930 American comedy movie directed by Leo McCarey and starring Edmund Lowe, Leila Hyams, Tommy Clifford, Walter McGrail, Louis Payne, Sam Lufkin, Bodil Rosing. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1930 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Leo McCarey
title: Part Time Wife
